T02D3110:205a-1: a'arya ta th'a ga toshn'i sha si t'a ta pa
T02D3110:205a-2: tre n'a ma aa ba r'a dzi ta au pa
T02D3110:205a-4: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung
T02D3110:205a-5: ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub pa
T02D3110:205a-6: zhes bya ba'i nye bar bshad pa /
T02D3110:205a-7: bcom ldan 'das gdugs dkar mo can la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3110:205a-8: snying rje chen pos sems bskyed de /
T02D3110:205a-9: mandal legs par byugs te thig la dang me tog
T02D3110:205b-0: gi tshom bu bkram @205b nas spyan drangs pa dang
T02D3110:205b-1: / mchod pa sngon du 'gro bas legs pa dang
T02D3110:205b-2: ldan pa la mchod pa dang gtor ma sbyin par
T02D3110:205b-3: / bya'o // de nas mandal la aa las zla ba la aom bsams la /
T02D3110:205b-5: bsdu ba byas pa las bcom ldan 'das ma gdugs dkar mo zhal gsum ma /
T02D3110:205b-6: zhal gsum la spyan gsum gsum yod pa'o //
T02D3110:205b-7: sngo ba dang dmar ba ni g-yon dang g-yas kyi zhal la'o //
T02D3110:205b-8: rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan pa phyag brgyad pa /
T02D3110:205b-9: g-yas kyi dang po na gdugs dkar po /
T02D3110:205b-13: g-yon dang po na rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3110:205b-14: gnyis pan rdo rje dkar po'o //
T02D3110:205b-16: bzhi pa na zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub ni g-yon pa'o //
T02D3110:205b-17: khros pa'i stangs dang bcas pas ma rungs pa thams cad 'jigs par byed pa'o //
T02D3110:205b-18: 'od zer lcags kyu dang 'dra bas ye shes kyi
T02D3110:205b-19: lha dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang
T02D3110:205b-20: dbang du bya'o // dbang du bskur ba la bee ro tsa na'o //
T02D3110:205b-21: phyag dang mchod pa byas nas sngon du byas te dmigs pa bcu bzhis bklag par bya'o //
T02D3110:205b-22: legs pa dang ldan pa la gzungs kyis bstod pa bya'o //
T02D3110:205b-23: yang na mdun du dmigs te bstan pa ltar kun yid kyis bya ba yin no //
T02D3110:205b-24: dmigs pa bcu bzhi ni phyag gi dmigs pa dang /
T02D3110:205b-26: ri khrod lo ma can nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang /
T02D3110:205b-28: bcom ldan 'das ma'i che ba dang /
T02D3110:205b-30: gdon chen po nyi shu rtsa bzhi bzlog pa dang /
T02D3110:205b-33: dam tshig can bcu bzhi'i sngags dang /
T02D3110:205b-35: nad thams cad bsrung ba dang /
T02D3110:205b-38: 'di dang phyi mar phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D3110:205b-39: bu sri dang g-yul zhi ba dang /
T02D3110:205b-40: khyad par du bdag bsrung ba dang /
T02D3110:205b-42: / gshegs pa dang bsdu ba byas te/ m ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya'o //
T02D3110:205b-43: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung
T02D3110:205b-44: a'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub pa
T02D3110:205b-45: zhes bya ba'i nye bar bshad pa bla ma rdo
T02D3110:205b-46: rje gad na pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D3110:205b-48: // / pandi ta chen po de nyid dang /
